#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
    cin.tie(0);
    int t,countv,res[40],i,j,p;
    char x[100];
    std::cin>>t;
    p=t;
    int l=0;
    while(t)
    {
        countv=0;
        std::cin>>x;
        for(i=0;i<strlen(x);i++)
        {
            if(x[i]=='A' || x[i]=='D' || x[i]=='O' || x[i]=='P' || x[i]=='Q' || x[i]=='R')
                countv++;
            if(x[i]=='B')
                countv += 2;
        }
        res[l] = countv;
        l++;
        t--;
    }
for(i=0;i<p;i++)
    std::cout<<res[i]<<endl;

return 0;
}
